page.title: 18HOUSING
page.content: Housing tends to be where the employment is,as{public transport within and out of this area is very sparse.Most people live in farm houses or tied cottages where they work. There are no housing projects or groups of houses,other than those attached to farms.The people who work at the residential establishments either live on the premises or out of the area,travelling in daily. Several of the farms have recently renovated their farm houses,or built new ones with central heating and modern fitted kitchens.
